projects.name: Gallipoli: The Scale of War
projects.title: <small>Gallipoli:</small>The Scale of War
projects.description: I did wireframes, Front-end, and Interaction design. using GSAP for the animations & AngularJS for the implemetation, also I got a Gold Best Awards NZ for this site.

projects.name: Manfeild
projects.title: <small>Events centre</small>Manfeild
projects.description: I did wireframes, art direction and design using Adobe Photoshop, the main idea for this project was take the colors of the main photography of the page and implement in each of its segments.

projects.name: Christian Andrada
projects.title: <small>Speaker, Couch & Consultant</small>Christian Andrada
projects.description: For this project I did Art direction, Creative idea & Web Development, I used AngularJS for the Front-end Implementation and Wordpress for the Back-end, powered with GSAP TweenMax.
